item.description:
[b[color=crimson]]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."

Saturday, FEBRUARY 13, Best Western Hotel Grand Ballroom, 477 Totten Pond Rd., Waltham. Exit 27A off Rte. 128. (781)446-0234.
www.se-4u.com
Terrific dance music by Award-winning DJ, 8:30-12:00 AM.
Free RUMBA dance lessons 7:30-8:30.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES, 35-60 years old.
Complimentary hors d’oeuvres 9-10.
Generous door prizes and MATCHING game with additional prizes.
Proper business dress required…sports jacket, or tie, for men required; business or party finery for women.
Cost is $12 ALL NIGHT.
Co-Sponsored by the Young Professionals Club of Boston and THE SINGLE CEO CLUB: www.singleceos.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: "THE SINGLE EXECUTIVES CLUB" VALENTINE DANCE
